R RAJESWARI  RESUME  
 
 
Resume  
 
Flat G3, Dynamic Flats, No.3 , 3rd Main Road, Nanga nallur, Chennai 600 061.  Summary  
Attentive Middle School Math Teacher with excellent communication skills.  Organized and driven with 
the innate ability to stay on task.  Uses effective and efficient methods of teaching whilst focusing on the 
individual needs of each student.  
Highlights  
• Lesson planning expertise  
• Academic performance evaluation  
• Common core knowledge  
• Strong communication & analytical skills  
• Student motivation  
• Use of aids  (Math lab, smart board etc.) to give concrete idea of the concepts to the students  
Experience  
• Six years as a Math teacher with Patel Public School, Bellandur , Bengaluru  (From June 2010 till 
March 2016)  
• One year + as a Math Curricula m Team Member with Chrysalis High  Chain of Schools  (CBSE), 
Bengaluru ( From May  2016 to June  2017)  
• Presently working as a Cue Math Teacher Par tner from August 2017  
• X Std ICSE Board examination - paper evaluation (2014 -2015)  
• X Std ICSE Board Exam  Invigilator  for 4 years   
• Attended Math workshop (six sessions) conducted by Azim Premji University  
• Attended Math workshops conducted by Oxford press and Madhuban publications  
• Conducted & organizing teacher for Prathiba  Vignan  Math talent exam for the last 6 years  
• Member – School examination committee for the last 3 years  
Academic Qualifications  
• Masters in Math from Manon mania m Sundaranar University , May 2016 (First Class)  
• Bachelor of Math from University of Madras with 85% (1997)  
• Bachelor of Education from Bhartidasan University with 77% (2014)
